title: RP Price adjustment is ridiculous, make it cost more not give less
body: All the bloody costs of things you buy with RP are balanced around the original amounts of RP awarded for the various price tiers as on NA. Reducing the RP awarded instead of increasing the prices just majorly fucks with everything. Please fix this Riot.

replies.body:
how so? I think its dumb to simply have riot points in the first place when strait 1 to 1 transactions are simpler with a $ amount on everything. However Riot want to make sure you don't actually realise how much your spending when you buy a Legendary skin or something like that.

That being said, the number changes are arbitrary, and have don't have a real impact.
How exactly is 1100 weirder when compared to 1270?

NZ has always had this lessened rate of RP. It is absolutely hilarious seeing all these Australians crying over it. 

Before you say* "but exchange rates and blahblahblah"*, when you get some money in your own currency, you don't think of it in comparison to the relative amount it would be in another currency, you would be like *"yessss money, time to go buy some doritos and mountain dew"*. Also compare the minimum wages -Australian $16-18 and NZ $14.25- it still works out to be pretty equal.
but this is easier cause they can keep their prices the same.
